metaData.label: SURG
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Reanimation OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Haematology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Intensive Care  OR SPECIALTY_1 equal General Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Colorectal Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urological Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gynaecological Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Anesthesiology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pharmacology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Bacteriology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Surgery

metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatrics OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Child Dental Therapists OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Neurology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Otolaryngology (ENT) Child OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Allergy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Endocrinology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Child/Adolescent Psychiatrist OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Gastroenterology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Dermatology Child OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gynaecology Child OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Rheumatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Perinatology
